title.narrative: BBCMA Klahan9 SPACE Empowering a Generation of Young Cambodians 2021-2023
BBCMA Stärka en generation av unga kambodjaner 2021-2023

description.narrative: In reference to project documents submitted by BBCMA in April 2021, BBC Media Action's Klahan9 SPACE's main objective is to increase levels of civic engagement among young people in Cambodia by "equipping them with the knowledge, skills, confidence, motivation and networks to participate and enhancing conditions for them to do so" (p-15, Klahan9 SPACE full proposal). The hypothesis of the proposal is assessed that at the end of the implementation of the programme each individual will be impacted by the anticipated outcomes, and that individual and collective efforts with the aim to increase levels of civic engagement could make a difference in the civic life of one's community and developing the combination of knowledge, skills, values and motivation to make a more enabling environment in Cambodian society. Sida assessed that the impact hypothesis proposed by BBC Media Action will guide and contribute to the overall success of outcomes of the implementation of their programme.

Projektet syftar till att stärka en generation unga kambodjaner genom att stimulera deltagande och samhällsengagemang. Klahan9 SPACE kommer att ge unga kvinnor och män möjlighet att delta i beslutsfattandet i samhällsfrågor som påverkar dem och deras samhällen, skapa inkluderande online- och offlineutrymmen för engagemang och förstärka deras röster. Unga kvinnor och män kommer att förses med kunskap, färdigheter och själveffektivitet för att engagera och påverka beslutsfattandet i frågor som är viktiga för dem och deras samhällen. Detta kommer att ske genom att ändra negativa normer och attityder kring ungdomars deltagande, uppmuntra diskussioner, med beslutsfattare och stärka tillhandahållandet av medier av allmänt intresse för och representativa för ungdomar.

The current project since 2021 lasting until 2023 entitled “Klahan9 SPACE – Stimulating participation and civic engagement” intends to address common knowledge, attitudinal and skills-related barriers to participation as well as positively shifting social and cultural norms which inhibit young people’s participation in public life based on the findings of their informed research studies. The findings from their research studies supports the formulation of the overall objective of the SPACE project which is to focus on the increased “levels of civic engagement amongst young people in Cambodia by equipping them with the knowledge, skills, confidence, motivation and networks to participate and enhancing conditions for them to do so”. SPACE project is drawn from the successes and lessons learned from our youth empowerment work in Cambodia, including Loy9, Love9 and most recently Klahan9 through the previous Swedish support (contribution number 12818).
This proposal outlines the rationale for support for an innovative, wide-ranging and exciting programme to stimulate the participation in public life of young Cambodian women and men aged 15 to 30 at scale. Klahan9 SPACE uniquely combines the media and communication expertise of BBC Media Action with the long-standing and deeply rooted community experience of three local organisations – Youth Council Cambodia, Youth Resource Development Program and Bophana Center. The project will empower young women and men to participate in public life, creating inclusive online and offline spaces for civic engagement and amplifying their voices.
The project aims at empowering a generation of young Cambodians through stimulating participation and civic engagement. Klahan9 SPACE will empower young women and men to participate in decision making on civic issues that affect them and their communities, creating inclusive online and offline spaces for engagement and amplifying their voices. Young women and men will be equipped with knowledge, skills and self-efficacy to engage and influence decision-making on issues that matter to them and their communities. This will be done by shifting negative norms and attitudes around youth participation, encouraging discussions, with decision-makers and strengthening the provision of public interest media for and representative of youth.

tag.narrative: 10.2 - By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

10.2 - Till 2030 möjliggöra och verka för att alla människors, oavsett ålder, kön, funktionsnedsättning, ras, etnicitet, ursprung, religion eller ekonomisk eller annan ställning, blir inkluderade i det sociala, ekonomiska och politiska livet.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
